com.shopwiki.roger.event
Class MessageWorker<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.shopwiki.roger.event.MessageWorker<T>

public class MessageWorker<T>
extends java.lang.Object

A glue class that packages together a MessageHandler and the RabbitMQ plumbing needed to use it. The user is expected to instantiate one of these and call the start() method to begin handling messages.

Author:
rstewart
